Name: Micro Mages
About the game: Micro Mages is a platform game developed for the original 8-bit NES console. Now on Steam! Slip into your wizard robes and enter the Demon Fortress, home of great treasure and ghastly creatures alike. Shoot and wall-jump your way up the fortress's towers and battle the evil bosses lurking at the top. Play solo or join forces with your friends. This game supports up to 4 players. Will you help each other overcome the dangerous traps built to stop nosy adventurers or will you turn on your comrades to snatch the high score? No downtime: If you die while at least one other player is still alive, you will turn into a ghost and can help by freezing enemies. Try to open crates and treasure chests to find a Fairy or Feather that will bring you back to life. 1 to 4 players simultaneous Cooperate or compete for score 26 spooky levels (normal + hard modes) Dangerous traps, monsters and bosses Ancient secrets Password function allows you to continue your game - in classic NES fashion ROM included in installation folder (right-click the game in your Steam library, click Properties/Local Files/Browse Local Files...) You can access a colorful manual in the style of classic NES instruction booklets without buying the game, check the links on the right side of this store page!
